name: wrong_start
diff:
--- a/src/solution.py
+++ b/src/solution.py
@@ -3,7 +3,7 @@
     # BUG: off-by-one in loop
     if n <= 1:
         return n
-    a, b = 0, 1
+    a, b = 1, 1
     for _ in range(n):
         a, b = b, a + b
     return a

name: correct_loop_n_minus_1
diff:
--- a/src/solution.py
+++ b/src/solution.py
@@ -4,6 +4,6 @@
     if n <= 1:
         return n
     a, b = 0, 1
-    for _ in range(n):
+    for _ in range(n - 1):
         a, b = b, a + b
     return a

name: wrong_return_b
diff:
--- a/src/solution.py
+++ b/src/solution.py
@@ -6,4 +6,4 @@
     a, b = 0, 1
     for _ in range(n):
         a, b = b, a + b
-    return a
+    return b
